m_szDocSumamry: $8.5 Million Raised By Viridity Energy May 20th, 2016 by Jake Richardson   Battery storage solutions provider Viridity Energy has raised $8.5 million from AltEnergy LLC. Viridity makes demand response and management software to optimize energy revenue and cost reductions, in combination with battery storage solutions. AltEnergy is an investment firm that focuses on demand response, renewables, energy storage, high-voltage transmission, demand management, and cyber security.
